articles.author: Reema Tendulkar
articles.title: Is the Indian IT rally overdone? Two brokerages sound a word of caution on Infosys, TCS and peers - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Nifty IT index has risen 6% over the last three months with all stocks barring Wipro and Tech Mahindra delivering positive returns between 3% to as high as 33% (Persistent Systems).

articles.author: Smriti Chaudhary
articles.title: Whats Driving Vodafone Idea Stock Rally? Its Not Business Fundamentals - BQ Prime
articles.description: While the telecom operator's ability to continue as a going concern is at risk, the only thing driving its share price is 'hope'.
